page.title: 13Caravan Sites in Ingleton
page.content: His other caravan site is just up the road. He has sixty five caravans which are static caravans and there are forty to fifty of them being used on average each week. Eighteen caravans are old ones. Mr Greenwood does not do much of his work on his own he has his son to help him most of the time. Up to four tourist caravans come each week with about sixteen people.There are two other caravan sites in Ingleton. There is Greenwood Leghe on the opposite side of the road from the Moorgarth Garage in Ingleton and the other caravan site is Holme Head. It is owned by Mr and Mrs Morphet and is just next door to Mr Greenwood's house. Greenwood Leghe is owned by Mr Stocks.
